landing_title: Программа финансовой помощи - Кризис в Украине
landing_description:
Красный Крест Румынии и МКЧХ оказывают финансовую помощь гражданам Украины и резидентам Украины, которые были вынуждены покинуть страну из-за конфликта.

С помощью этого приложения Вы можете подать заявку на финансовую помощь где бы Вы ни находились, загрузить документы и получить результат рассмотрения Вашей заявки. Денежная помощь Красного Креста бесплатная и у Вас ничего не должны просить взамен, в случае, если такое произойдет, пожалуйста сообщите об этом ХХХХХ

Помощь заключается в том, чтобы помочь Вам удовлетворить потребности Ваши и Вашей семьи.

Вы должны:
1. Иметь документы удостоверяющие личность членов семьи.
2. Вы были вынуждены покинуть Украину из-за конфликта.
3. Относится к одной из этих категорий:
- Женщины возглавляющие свою семью
- Глава семьи с двумя или более детьми
- Имеете члена семьи с физической или умственной инвалидностью
- Имеете члена семьи возрастом старше 60 лет
- Глава семьи в сопровождении беременных или кормящих женщина
- Одинокая женщина без сопровождения
- Отсутствие бесплатного доступа к медицинской помощи


Если мы не сможем подтвердить Вашу личность, Вы получите сообщение с информацией о том, что делать дальше.

В целях безопасности:
Не доверяйте и не платите третьим лицам, которые утверждают, что могут помочь вам получить доступ к этой программе.
Мы не распределяем денежную помощь несовершеннолетним/детям
consent_title: Consent to the Collection & Processing of Personal Data
consent_description:
The Romanian Red Cross and the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies collects and processes your personal data as part of this financial assistance application process:

1. We collect personal data for each member in the household. This includes name, date of birth
2. We collect government issued identity document, which could include QR codes from the Diia App or photos of Ukrainian government issued identity documents such as national identification card, passports, or driver's license and images of individuals holding government identity documents.
3. We collect location through mobile phones or browsers.

We are collecting this information to verify your identification and eligibility for Red Cross financial assistance.

You must consent to the collection of personal data to be able to apply for financial assistance.
consent_comm_description:
As part of the Red Cross financial assistance program, we plan to use SMS, WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber, or email to notify you of updates to your application. You must consent to receive information via these methods.


You must consent to the collection of personal data to be able to apply for financial assistance. Without consent, we cannot contact you to inform you about the status of your application.
location_check_description: When asked, please allow your device to provide location information to us.
location_check_use_description:
We use the location information as part of the eligibility criteria.

We will not share your location information to 3rd parties.
checklist_description_before_start: Before you start the registration process, please make sure you have everything below. The registration process will take 15-20 minutes in total.
checklist_diia_app_description: Using the Diia App is the most convenient way to get registered with the programme. If you don't have the app, we recommend that you first download the Diia app for all adults in your family on their personal phones now.
checklist_check_adults_title: Documents for each person (14 years old and older)
checklist_check_children_title: Documents for each person (Under 14 years old)
checklist_check_children_content: Mother's Diia App (Digital Birth Certificates) OR
checklist_continue_button: I have all these things. Let's start.
permission_title: App Permissions for Camera and Location
permission_description: In order to continue with registration for assistance, we need to have the follow app permissions from you.
permission_location_description: We need this to check if you are in one of the countries covered by the assistance programme
permission_camera_description: We need this to take pictures for document and identity verification
permission_camera_settings_alert_descrip: We need this to check if you are in one of the countries covered by this assistance programme.
permission_location_settings_alert_desci: We need this to take pictures for verification purposes.

attestation_questions.text: We want to assist those who left Ukraine due to the conflict. What best describes your current situation in Romania?

options.text: I left Ukraine because of the conflict.
I resided in Romania before Febuary 24, 2022.
I was in Romania before Feb 24, 2022 but could not return to the Ukraine because of the conflict.
I did not leave Ukraine due to the conflict.

attestation_questions.text: In Romania, do you have acccess to health care?

focal_point_registration_family_focal_po:
The focal point is a person who makes decisions for the family, right now.

Are you the focal point for your household?
You must first register the focal point of the household.
focal_point_registration_verify_title: How do you want to be verified?
focal_point_registration_diia_descriptio: This is the fastest way to get verified. If you don't have Diia app, download it.
focal_point_verification_document_descri: Take a picture of your identity document
focal_point_verification_face_and_docume: Take a picture of your face next to the identity document

focal_point_details.text: Is this person living with a physical disability?
Is this person living with a mental disability?
Is this person living with a chronic medical illness?
Is this person living with a chronic medical illness?
focal_point_details.note: Only for women and adults 14+ up to 51 included

loop_members_other_adults_note: Do the ID Flow for all adults in the family. Diia or Pictures, ask Vulnerabilities
loop_members_children_note: Do the ID Flow for all adults in the family. Diia or Pictures, ask Vulnerabilities
